alert.note: Alert for Absaroka Mountains; Wind River Mountains East (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 11 at 4:43AM MDT until April 12 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 6 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Periods of snow, heavy at times. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Absaroka Mountains and Wind River Mountains East. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 6 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could become very difficult over South Pass and the Chief Joseph Highway. The cold wind chills as low as 30 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Visibility around a tenth of a mile in heaver snow could result in snowmobilers becoming disoriented and lost.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Absaroka Mountains; Wind River Mountains East
